nodes.text: The Lurid Gundarks was a criminal gang that operated in Tolea Biqua on Genarius during the Clone Wars. They were led by Carlin and based in the Chancellor's Head pub. When Riboga the Hutt returned to the Cularin system and retook control of crime there, the Gundarks refused to join his new organization. Riboga sent a group of his minions, lead by Mok Cadrak, to Tolea Biqua to attack the Gundarks and they confronted them inside the Chancellor's Head. With the help of the Heroes of Cularin, the Gundarks were able to defeat the Hutt enforcers.
